name: aliw/employee-detail-plugin
description: This plugin retrieves user/employee data from the database and makes it available as a 'Gutenberg Block' in WordPress. The user can be selected from a drop-down list showing the image, name & position of the user in the company. Upon clicking on the element, an overlay appears showing more information about the user, such as a description and a few social links. (Note that the plugin uses custom-generated data from the database and not default WordPress user-values as the data taken such as an image are specific to the user, which is more than what WordPress usually stores as use-data.)
